summary.submission_info: Letters of Interest to organize ECSA in September 2027 and onwards
summary.registration: Fees will be funded from registration fees and additional sponsors or actions.
summary.description: ECSA is the premier European conference on Software Architecture covering all aspects of research from theory to technology and their applications.

required_elements.details: Name and short CV, including experience on organizing international conferences.
General presentation of the potential venue and the city.
Preliminary list of organizations supporting the proposal, including academia, research institutions, industry, and other relevant organizations.

optional_elements.details: Initial list of names for potential Program Chair(s) and other Organizing Committee members (not binding).

summary.publication_details: Proceedings have been published by Springer in the LNCS series since 2007.
summary.academic_reputation: ECSA is a top-ranked conference with an ‘A’ CORE conference rank since 2010.
summary.conference_scope: Covers all aspects of research in Software Architecture.
